title: Cake Flour Making
directions: Measure out the amount needed for your recipe. I always measure out 6 cups of all purpose flour.
For every 1 cup of flour remove 2 Tbsp of flour.

Sift 5-6 times and it's ready-to-use cake flour. (To sift flour without a sifter just use a strainer by filling it with flour and tapping against the palm of your hand over a bowl. (left-over flour can go back in the bag). Always measure the flour that is needed after its sifted.
